chapter.text: Have you (O Muhammad) not seen how your Lord dealt with the owners of the elephant (The elephant army came under the command of Abraha, king of Yemen, who intended to destroy the Ka’bah at Makkah in the year of Muhammad’s year of birth)
Did He not make their plot go in astray
And He sent against them birds in flocks
which pelted them with stones of baked clay
and He made them like the chewed-up stalks
